rows.label: tlk70000064_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Rumors of great big Grail make it as
far even as sleepy Gula.

rows.label: tlk70000064_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Because of Grail-related hullabaloo,
many people of Iira come to Gula
to find some safety.

rows.label: tlk70000064_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But Gula is place of mighty nature,
and have many bitey-fighty monsters
in heartlands. Not so safe for refugees.

rows.label: tlk70000064_05_msg0004
rows.name:
If it wasn't for group of leftover
people from Shiya, Gula would be
nice and sleepy and peaceful.

rows.label: tlk70000064_05_msg0005
rows.name:
So some people gather in wreckage
of Trigo. Not so many monsters
there.
